title: नहीं, यह वीडियो चीन और पाकिस्तान को जोड़ने वाले 880 किमी लंबे हाईवे का नहीं है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Road between #China and #Pakistan

 The road cost China $ 65 billion and its construction took 36 months and has a length of 880 km. The dangerous part of it is 24 km long in the area of ​​Lake Attaabad.
